title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' has no effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', the label does not disappear in the PDF preview.
EB: Expected result: The label should disappear in the PDF preview.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the display property to 'none'.
4. Preview the PDF.
